text:
Akshay enjoys punches with Rajini

Akshay Kumar, who plays the villain in the sequel of Robot , is elated to be exchanging some punches with Rajinikanth in the film.

“I feel like I am on top of the world. It’s alright getting kicked and punched. I have done that all my life. It is great to be punched by a superhero like Rajinikanth,” Akshay said.

“I am looking forward to play a negative role. It will be an honour,” he added.

“I am not doing any preparations... No training as such yet. There is no training for it. I just have to condition my jaw that’s it,” Akshay added. — PTI
title: ENT-AKSHAY (BES3)
